english.segment1: Holding on when it seems that your grip is failing. Whos to say that you cant take it back?. Live your life as if you know this is your last day. Make the choice to live forever.
english.segment2: The decisions weighing the answer is yours. You cant wait forever dont let yourself hit the floor. The prodigal one wont you return. The light is on the door is open. You bed is made your home is here. Come back and laugh and we will forget. Everything youve done wrong is gone here.
english.segment3: Stepping back to see footprints youve left in your path. Stepping up for everything youve done. Now move on pack up your thoughts and keep on going. Keep the faith and you will be all right. Receive the prayers prayed for you here.
